title.en: Respiratory Core of the Emerald Abyss

description.ko: 이끼와 빛이 하나의 생명 기계로 융합되는 생물 발광 호흡의 관점에서 유기적 생명체를 탐구합니다.
description.en: An exploration of organic life through the lens of bioluminescent respiration, where moss and light merge into a living machine.

prompt: A cinematic, macro shot of a bioluminescent organic heart-lung hybrid made of translucent #7FB069 emerald moss and pulsing #FFE66D amber sap veins. The entity breathes in a deep #2D5A3D underwater forest of glowing kelp. Heavy subsurface scattering on the mossy membranes, with #E6F2E1 spores drifting like stardust. Rendered in Unreal Engine 5 with Octane Render, 8k resolution, hyper-realistic fluid dynamics of liquid light, volumetric light shafts piercing the dark water, focusing on the microscopic texture of the breathing light of nature.
